title: There's actually going to be a Banana skin for Raka!
body:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/03/311-pbe-update.html

Man! I like all of them!

replies.body: I'm not an udyr person, but that skin us just too %%%%ing funny.
exactly my thoughts lol. I hate udyr but the skin is perfect
Oh my god thankyou Skyprus for showing me this you wonderful person! These skins are amazing.
Def not udyr is a fantastic skin. But banana raka is fantastic too.

I dislike Urf the Nami-tee. We could have gotten a proper Dolphin-tailed Nami skin, but instead we get Nami with a stupid hat, an inferior tail and a spatula.

I would like Archduke Nasus and Order of the Banana Soraka a lot more if they toned down the headpieces on the staves. I like the outfits, and they are both almost good enough to work as real skins, but the head of Soraka's staff needs to be more stylised and Nasus's needs to be smaller.

Definitely Not Udyr is a complete joke, but it is nothing but the joke. So I like it.
Here's an idea, Urf. (You know, the champion).

possible april fools? they go to so much effort now since everyone knows about the PBE patches....

hell, the champion mastery thing looks so troll...

I hope it's not fake!
I think they are just fun skins in the spirit of April Fools.
Hype for Order of the Banana Soraka, Definitely Not Udyr, Archduke Nasus, Urf the Nami-tee and Surprise Party Amumu
